divs: Sighting DetailsMe and my mom witnessed a ufo last night,,in Melbourne Florida . it was the shape of a Octagon , flew over the house very slow,, ran in and got my mom she is still excited about it,, it was black or dark greyish and had a red light under neath that changed shape from a circle to strobe then diamond , i watched it thru the birnoculars for about 10 minutes as it headed west, after it was gone i looked to see if anybody else had reported it,, but nothing on any of the news sites,, it was travelling from east to west headed towards the St. cloud Kissimmee area in Florida . we watched the object from our drive way it traveled directly over our property, at first i believed it to be a stealth fighter,, but after seeing it thru the birnoculars i realized it was octagon shaped. eventually it just vanished from site.
trends: There have been 18 other sightings in Melbourne
There were no other sightings in Melbourne on or around July 6th 2011
Summary: Octagon Shape with a red light on the bottom, that changed shape.
